page.title: 03HOME LIFE IN CONSTANTINE
page.content: Typical day rise between 7.30am-8.00 am.Breakfast individually on toast and cereals.Most parents both at work so family lunch at school or work place. Children return from school at 4.00pm and watch T.V., cook, family members help with chores before watching T.V. together or following leisure time pursuits until bed time.Children go to bed between 7.30 and 9.30pm,adults between 11.00 and midnight.Family interests,watch soap operas and sport on T.V..Village clubs and societies. Fathers do gardening D.I.Y. in house or car or visit pub.Mothers do handi- crafts.Families go boating,fishing, riding.Neighbours visit informally. Parents go for meal or drink.Friends stay for holiday. School and church events. Village exhibitions,shows,outings and carnival.
